import pygame



[docs]
class InputsPort:
    KEY_UP = pygame.K_UP
    KEY_DOWN = pygame.K_DOWN
    KEY_LEFT = pygame.K_LEFT
    KEY_RIGHT = pygame.K_RIGHT
    KEY_W = pygame.K_w
    KEY_S = pygame.K_s
    KEY_A = pygame.K_a
    KEY_D = pygame.K_d
    KEY_Q = pygame.K_q
    KEY_J = pygame.K_j
    KEY_K = pygame.K_k
    KEY_ONE = pygame.K_KP_1
